name: Acute Sinusitis
chief_complaint: I've had a stuffy nose and face pain for 10 days that's not getting better

lab_results.nasal culture: not typically required for uncomplicated cases

prognosis: Excellent with appropriate treatment; symptoms typically resolve within 7-14 days
description: Inflammation of the paranasal sinuses usually following an upper respiratory infection or allergic response, causing obstruction of sinus drainage
